short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Data privacy extension from PEXARG LLC

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
KYD (Keep Your Data) extension offers data privacy protection to the users by providing the opportunity to save their metadata on the KYD platform. This gives user the option to choose which websites can track and or keep your metadata. To save your data on the KYD platform, we require your email address as the unique identifier to preserve your metadata based on company privacy policy your metadata will NOT be shared or sold to any third parties without your consent. We provide you a user portal where meaningful reports are provided based on your browsing history data. Main features of the extension:
1. Clear browsing history data on demand or by selected schedule
2. Lock/Unlock your account on user portal
3. Keep a list of websites to be blocked
4. Ability to add an exception list of websites so that the browsing history data for these websites is not tracked in the reports
